Blog.post: today wake up wif sleepy eyes... wake up about 3 plus... so shoik as among the whole week.. last night was the only nite i can sleep my whole life back.. as ytd work full shift, today when i wake up still very tired sia.. haiz.. nvm.. when i wake up, i go out liao.. long time no update bankbook so today go update.. den go cmp QB house for a haircut.. so sianz.. den start work liao.. all the way crowd in until 9 sia... hate coupon promotion!!! still muz wait until 7 sep... haiz.. den after that me count cash liao when clearing cash me short $7... wah no money liao.. sianz.. nvm la not 1st time liao.. den after that zhong you sent me home.. on the way saw one lady.. everytime zhong you sent me home will see that lady one.. den we stop and see.. that lady will hire every taxi, open the door.. dunno talk wad to the taxi driver.. den close the door.. siao one.. lolz.. haiz so tired until nth to write liao... tml still have sch!! so sianz!!! haiz.. got to slp early liaoz.. or else tml cannot wake up liaoz.. nitez!

today up, nv eat breakfast, go work liao.. today me replace celestine from 11-5 den me work 5-10.. poor thing rite? lolz.. 11am reach liao alot of pple liaoz.. den me work base... jam up base.. den jo help me.. den she ask me go help pack home d.. den rotate the cashier go drink water.. den me go pack home d again.. den go make whip potato.. den go base.. den rotate cashier go drink water again.. cannot even sit down and rest for 20 secs.. so b-u-s-y!! arrr...!! den me about 4 go cashier liao.. den about 5 go dress up as chicky and play wif the kids.. nabei wear the costume damn hot sia.. when i remove the costume hoh.. my clothings is all wet.. even my underwear =x.. den me very tired liaoz.. work cashier wif my half life.. den after work still hav to do closing.. me so tired.. den count cash.. den rot there wait for zhong you to sent me home.. lolz.. wait until about 1am de go home sia.. haiz so tired... come home write blog... den wanna sleep liaoz.. or else my bones is going to crack...!!! lolz... gonna sleep liaoz.. nite!

today same loh.. go sch.. rot in sch.. den held up a meeting in class after sch.. den go back home.. today reach home quite early.. about 1.30pm reach home liaoz.. den me watch tv a while.. until 2.30pm.. den go cmp kfc... me today hav the star staff examination.. very scare.. coz if me never pass den create history in cmp kfc liaoz.. (1st person to fail 1 star staff examination) anli got tell me, although if i forget anything, juz smile smile and act blur.. lucky during the examination i got smile.. or else fail liaoz.. base almost fail sia.. lolz. lucky loh.. den after the examination, me work liaoz.. me work as cashier loh.. den got the edwin attach to me loh.. den he very blur... den me bek chek liaoz.. me dulan him until he knw how to pack... me den put him by himself to stand pos.. he can!! of coz la i teach one wad.. he only pack very slow only.. he put him alone.. den me go help top up all the things... lolz.. den after work.. zhong you sent me home again.. thankz! haha.. haiz me so tired.. feel like sleeping.. ok le write until here le ba.. nite!

today same loh.. go sch.. come back.. after school me go back home loh.. den tell mummy i got work.. but den is go out to celebrate si hui's bday.. meet si hui, anli, guowei, daniel, celestine, yuling, derrick, jiehwee, willie, yishan, adrain and dennis at 4.. den go orchard.. buy movie tickets, den go makan at lucky plaza.. very funny loh.. we sit in one row.. den we pass the dishes all around.. den tok tok.. joke joke.. lolz.. after that go watch movie, the Twins Effect II.. before the movie, we buy drinks from kfc.. (becoz can free refill) lolz..den we go in watch movie liaoz.. the movie not so nice... but very funny.. dennis sit beside me, den kana me beaten until siao.. hahaha.. after the movie, we go kfc again to refill the drinks.. wahhaha.. den we go walk walk.. rot rot.. until about 10.. den i go seperated ways as me need to go back cmp kfc.. i reach cmp kfc about 10.30pm.. amazing all their closing done liao.. den me rot there.. until about 12 zhong you sent me go home.. so sianz.. wanna sleep liaoz..

today is another sian day loh.. during morning assembly anbu say mdm tan not here... so we will have 3 periods of free period liaoz.. yeahh.. lolz.. after morning assembly is dnt.. sianz ar.. got 2 tests.. nvm loh.. after that is english and recess.. straight after recess is MT liaoz... woot! no nid to climb stairs we stay in the canteen do our self studies... den perlyn teo the all wanna discuss about the 'Be Yourself Day' and after that i dulan liaoz i scold they all.. they seems to be asking very stupid questions.. so pple i now confirm that the theme of 'Be Yourself Day' is 'Funky'.. den after school me go media.. den media haven end yet han hui ask me to go home.. ok loh i go home.. me dun like to be in media one.. haiz.. nth to add on liaoz me wanna go nap liaoz.. byez!

yeah...!! today is tuesday man!! finally i can take back my belongings liao.. today de lessons are nice man!! 1st 2 periods very sianz but after that 2 periods we song liao.. Mother Tongue, CME, PW, and PC.. woot song man.. today pw samuel's group present their project.. nice man!! lolz.. den as we cannot finish our lessons on time.. so miss neo took our PC periods to finish.. mrs koh den come to the comp lab and she conducted serveral surveys wif some of us.. den it's my turn!! as there will be a 'Be Yourself Day' on Youth day.. miss goh wan us to dress up but according to a similar theme.. so.. i conducted a votes for the theme and the final theme is 'Funky'.. Friends.. if u hav any suggestions pls voice out to me so that i can be able to make alternative arrangement.. the theme can be change.. pls voice out to me asap as the deadline is on friday.. we are also required to donate for "The President's Challenge" in order to facilite the event.. so.. the bell gone and we all need to do a survey again.. we go to the respective comp lab and we finish the survey.. me straight after the survey me go police academy to retreive my belongings.. song!! me take bus there and after which i took cab back home.. with my ez-link and my keys things are now easier to go along.. me today got training at 6.. den me and sihui go theory test again.. lucky the actual test date is postpone.. or else me sure fail one.. the theory test so difficult me forget alot of things sia.. haiz me muz go and study again liao or else sure fail one.. after work about 11 that time jun jie go and take bread from breadtalk back.. wahkao one black garbage bag full or breads..!!! siao! zhong you after that sent me home.. although i take only one Large TA bag of bread go home but when i squeze it into the refrigalator, me found out that it took so much space!! haha.. sianz liao.. wanna sleep liao.. gtg le.. take care friends!!

today me go back to school sia... 2 weeks never go back... haiz... today go school wif black shoes.. lucky got ask bao sheng help me to bring one pair.. (hey! thank you bao sheng) me faster change den go morning assembly... today me very lost in sch sia.. all the lessons i miss out so much.. far far back behind the syllabus.. haiz.. me after sch rush to kfc liao.. den take wrong bus...!! actually wanna take 163/371/372 go one but me take bus 82!! arrrhhh.... me alighted at the bus stop near 299 den me walk all the way to compass point as me no more money to board another bus liao... ;( haiz.. when i reach compass point is already 3.40pm liao.. haiz.. kfc that time alot of pple no place to sit so me change into uniform and to in read the star 2000... actually wanna read up and memorise the content of star 2000 because the test is tml... but... when i finish reading it, anli come and she tell me that the test is postpone to friday!! arrrrr...!! me wasted my effort going down early sia... nvm loh... den me today same same work until 10 loh.. den jun jie and his family come liao.. me talk rot wif him... after that he go breadtalk take bread for us... so good of him... me den pei daniel go wait for bus 27 den go home.. go home already 1++ liao.. bathed liao already 2++ le.. sianz ar so tired.. hiya me go sleep liaoz lolz...

today very sian leh... wake up at 7am wanting to go npcc.. but... mother say stay at home.. but after that i sneak out and go to work... me actually work 6 one... but i reach there 3 plus... den jo ask me to help her work 4... ok loh me very steady one ma... lolz.. wah the customer queue today is as long as a dragon sia.. kaoeh the customer keep coming in sia non stop sia lucky got my papa (zhongyou) and jacq at base so products no jam... den hoh we is take order until no strength sia.. when wendy rotate us go drink water we drink water+ sit down in store room rest.. but me not so bad la me service champion wad... (lolz) jkjk.. me drink water liaoz straight away come out liao.. me today make a bet wif shawn loh we compare sakes today see whose sales higher... lolz... no need to say one wad me sure will win one coz i pos 2 he pos 1.. pos 1 is so called the customer service contiment station... can say almost every order got pple come take chillie one... that will slow down the service timing so i have the benefit of the doubt.. a bet is a bet.. me got confident i will win shawn one so as a service champion (me fang pee)... me of coz will fasten up my service timing one wad... that is why my sales hit $1000!! (applause)... lolz.. today de 10.30 cashier is derrick... he hoh deploy me do hot/cold well!! kaoeh me 10.00pm liaoz still at there taking order leh... but nvm friends ma me help him do closing because it is saturday ma... haha.. after work my papa(zhongyou) sent me home heez.. den daniel, guo wei and willie go supper loh.. too bad i cannot thon if i can i sure go one.. when i reach on i switch on comp sia so many of my collegues online sia (yishan, anli, dennis, sihui).. me chat wif them all the way until 3am den we go slp.. wad a hard day... LOL

friday 13.. bu ji li... suay sia the hq pple call me and tell me that me can only retreieve my stuffs tuesdays onwards.. KNN me have to go buy sch shoes or else monday no sch liaoz.. nabei.. after that call me damn sianz.. so i early go down cmp kfc (4.00pm) help out..nabei sia enter kfc see crowd sianz liaoz.. go in store room saw all the stocks stack until no space to put sia.. wah today wait for sihui come for training can wait until sleep one.. she reach at 6.20pm sia.. kao eh.. nvm la... den later 1 star staff training that time 1st is theory test!! siao la me never even go study how to pass theroy test? me only got 50% for theory and theory muz at least get 90% den is pass one leh.. even sihui also got 87.5%... tyco la... lolz.. jkjk.. somemore POS stands for point of sales not product of service!! LOL!! den after that is pratical.. i love pratical sia! it is so fun!! first go in do procedure fries.. den procedure zinger... den mayo.. kaoeh juz now top up mayo that time when me throw the empty mayo pack that time fall down!! kaoeh kings shoes leh should me safety boots ma... still fall down... haiz... 4get it la.. we top up mayo muz use straw ma... den me see si hui top up that time use the straw pok the air bubble pop until very bek chek... wahahahahaha... den after which me go walk walk wif sihui haha so sian.. den we two talk talk.. den walk slow slow back.. help out them.. den saw yuling come den after that kai ying also come.. den after work we talk talk until si bei song.. they wanna go punggol end ton but too bad me cannot go... sad ar... friday 13 really bu ji li sia alot of pple kana bad luck.. me kana fall down den get back belongings only after tuesday onward.. alot of my friends also kana bad luck... my best wishes to u all!! smile always!

grrrr...!! siansation is the word!! having stayed at home for 24 hours.. and i spent 20 hours sleeping!! arrr..!! woke up 12.20pm today.. spend 5 mins brushing my teeth and 5 minutes switching on my tv.. =X lolz.. kidding la.. watch tv from 12.30pm-1.30pm.. den its's computer time.. haiz.. can rot at home liao.. my wallet is at ubin.. can't really go anywhere... without my keys, i can't even get out from my house!! siao liaoz.. now i'm alone at home.. bored to death la.. haiz.. dunno wad to do sia.. play comp write blog... if nobody gonna call me or tok to me.. i'm going to rot to death liaoz... ARRRRR......!!!!

wah kao eh.... juz come back from the national camp as casualty. haiz.. the national camp is quite fun as i get to knw alot of pple from various uniform groups.. they are all very friendly.. but.. haiz got to come back as shoulder last time injured pain again.. wake up damn early loh.. den go the falg raising ceremony cannot see flag.. haiz.. P.trainging also cannot participate.. after that report sick the Dr siao come and see.. me shoulder already rotting sia.. Singapore!!! come back to singapore see doctor sia haha... sianz.. come back le wait at changi jetty... wait for the first aider go drive the ambulance.. come back wif 3 first aider, one gal 2 men. gal call shu hui.. quite cute la she got talk to me so that i dun rot there.. the other 2 dun care their name lolz... jkjk.. sit in ambulance inside is damn cold.. somemore the 2 male first aider talk cold jokes there.. such as later go hospital muz look for Dr Tua as juz now at ubin is Br Siao.. lolz cold until turn into ice =X.. reach changi hospital liaoz.. go the accident and emergency dept where i come be4 when i fall on 1st aug at compass point.. see doctor there quite fast also dunno why.. i think the doctor heck care sia.. go inside, ask me move hand, ask me got go sch anot, den give me mc.. den can go back liao.. den my mother ask me to go back myself.. but i cant!! my ez-link card is in my wallet and my wallet is in my bag and my bag is at ubin!! siao liao! haiz.. still muz wait until friday for my friends to bring back for me.. sianz ar.. the first aider later sent me home.. i told them my mum will be back home by 12 but my mum end up reaching home at 2.. i sit by the door and fall asleep.. minutes were passing very slo when i was by my hse door... haiz eat medicine liaoz come online pple ask me create blog.. den i create loh.. lolz my first blog written wor.. haiz nth really much to add on la.. hope i can pass my next two days faster loh so that i can get back my belongings..
